sentences.sentence: All the thwarted longings, all the stern denials.
sentences.translation: 一切受挫的愿望，一切严厉的拒斥。

sentences.sentence: I paint you and fashion you ever with my love longings.
sentences.translation: 我永远用爱恋的渴想来描画你。

sentences.sentence: And all the longings and all the loss can't bring back the dead.
sentences.translation: 所有的渴望，所有的损失都不可能带回死者。
